name: Arcades - Defenders
description: Walls/defender tribal. Chunky blockers, Asymmetric board wipes. Possible infinite combo.

name: Yidris - Storm
description: 4C storm using cantrips, flashback, tutors and mana doubling. Uses graveyard recursion and cascade to generate mana and cards.

name: Licia - Lifegain
description: Lifegain/lifeloss combined with voltron. Utilizing mardu removal and lots of incidential lifegain.

name: Queza - Draw/Wheels
description: Lots of card draw, drain and lifegain. Draw your deck and drain your opponents doing so.

name: Denry - Counters
description: Copy all counters (first strike, vigilance, +1/+1 etc.) onto other creatures on etb. Using azorius value creatures.

name: Klothys - Group Slug
description: Punish abilities, spells and land drops. Double damage, and recur lands from your graveyard.

name: Subira - Aggro
description: Deploy lots of creatures/creature tokens and use subiras ability to refill your hand.

name: Lurrus - Permanents
description: Deck consists of exclusively permanents with cmc<=2 for lurrus' ability. Strong removal and voltron package.

name: Garth - Value
description: Untap effects combined with land enchantments to produce lots of mana/untap valueable creatures (garth).

name: Kumena - Merfolk
description: Merfolk tribal utilizing untap/tap effects combined with simic card draw and ramp.

name: Tana Tevesh - Aristocrats
commander_name: Tana, the Bloodsower/Tevesh Szat, Doom of Fools
description: Aristocrats/tokens strategy using sacrifice to draw cards deal damage.

name: Wyleth - Equipments
description: Voltron using equipments with low equip costs to exploit Wyleth's ability to refill your hand.

name: Cecili - Control
description: Classic grixis spell control with a boatload of carddraw. Cecily can be used to cheat out big spells

name: Umbris - Voltron
description: Utilizes horros, mill and exile to make umbris huge. Interactivity focused on protecting umbris.

name: Sidisi - Reanimator/Tokens
description: Mill creatures, create tokens. Reanimate milled stuff or use tokens as fodder for card draw etc.

name: Galazeth - Artifacts
description: The strategy relies on a large number of token artifacts (treasures, clues) to fuel big mana spells

name: Selvala - Elves
description: Classic elfball tribal including white for protection.

name: Tasigur - Control
description: Graveyard control deck which largely relies on Tasigur's ability to recur cards.

name: Soraya - Old Border Birds
description: Strictly old border bird tribal using cards made before 2000.

name: Purphoros - Sneak Attack
description: Uses purphoros to bypass cmc and flash in big creatures/artifacts which high-impact etb/ltb abilities.

name: Ayara - Aristocrats
description: Aristocrats relying largely on token production to flood the board with expandible creatures.

name: Titania - Lands
description: Lands strategy which also sacrifices lands for Titania's value only to recur them later on.

name: Meren - Reanimator
description: Reanimator list with all the good golgari sacrifice/etb creatures to generate fast, recurrible value.

name: Rielle - Spellslinger
description: High power spellslinger deck using card draw/looting effect to exploit Rielle and draw even more cards.

name: Yuriko - Topdeck
description: High power dimir control list that relies on yuriko in combination with top-deck maniulation to flip high cmc spells to win.

name: Tibalt - Control
description: Rakdos control trying to win by generating too much value to deal with.

name: Hallar - Kicker
description: Gruul kicker spells, putting +1/+1 counters on hallar for the win.

name: Araumi - Reanimator
description: Focused on self mill to fuel Araumi's ability to make multiple copies of high impact creatures.

name: Keruga - Permanents
description: Deck consist of mostly permanents with cmc >=3 to get huge draws when Keruga enters.

name: Isshin - On Attack
description: Combat centric deck using on-attack triggers for the doubled value from isshin.

name: Losheel - Artifacts
description: Mono white artifacts going wide with artifact tokens or large cheated-in creatures.
